Package com.dromedarydrones.mainapp

Class Drone

java.lang.Object
com.dromedarydrones.mainapp.Drone
All Implemented Interfaces:
XmlSerializable
public class Drone
extends java.lang.Object
implements XmlSerializable
Drone utility for tracking drone settings and calculating order delivery times.

    Returns the average cruising speed in feet per second with full load.

  • Constructor Details

    • Drone

      public Drone()
      Default constructor that initializes the default settings. 
       max payload weight = 192 ounces | 12 pounds
 cruising speed     = 25 miles per hour
 flight time        = 20 minutes
 turn around time   = 2 minutes 30 seconds
 delivery time      = 30 seconds

    • Drone

      public Drone​(Drone other)
      Copy constructor that creates a deep copy of an existing drone instance.
      Parameters:
      other - the other instance to be cloned

    • Drone

      public Drone​(org.w3c.dom.Element root)
      Initialize drone settings from an XML object.
      Parameters:
      root - xml element containing drone data

  • Method Details

    • deliver

      public double deliver​(java.util.List<Order> orders, double currentTime) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Calculates the delivery times for a set of meals to be delivered.
      Parameters:
      orders - orders that need to be delivered
      currentTime - current time in the simulation
      Returns:
      time in seconds it took to deliver all meals
      Throws:
      java.lang.RuntimeException - if payload exceeds max takeoff weight or if the flight time exceeded the set limit
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

    • isSafeFlightTime

      public boolean isSafeFlightTime​(Route route) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Determines if the drone is capable of carrying out a route of deliveries without exceeding the max flight time.
      Parameters:
      route - route to be flown
      Returns:
      true if an acceptable flight time
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

    • isEstimatedSafeFlightTime

      public boolean isEstimatedSafeFlightTime​(java.util.List<Order> orders) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Over estimates if the flight time for a set of orders won't exceed the max.
      Parameters:
      orders - orders to check for
      Returns:
      true if safe
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

    • isSafePayloadCapacity

      public boolean isSafePayloadCapacity​(java.util.List<Order> orders) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Determines if the drone's max takeoff capacity can accommodate a collection of orders.
      Parameters:
      orders - orders to use
      Returns:
      true if weight is safe
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
